commits.message: Fixes EUCA-2348 Walrus reporting for system user events fixed and exceptions in reporting will not fail Walrus ops.

Fixes EUCA-2348, Bundle windows instance was failing, now fixed

The createbucket from the CLC during bundle-instance was failing due to a lookup of user that fails for SYSTEM_USER during usage accounting,
this fix removes the lookup and uses the message context instead and also ensures that failures in usage reporting will not cause the Walrus
operation to fail.

Also fixes a slight reporting error where a reporting event was sent when a delete marker was deleted rather than the object itself.

Merge branch 'dev/zhill/EUCA-2348' into testing
